Header: 3 GR Troops Provide Water to Drought-Hit Devotees
Content: Water supply by Army bowsers to the annual Sri Naga Kovil ceremony at Mankulam on Wednesday (4) came in for praise of the Kovil priests and devotees alike. 3 Gajaba Regiment (GR) troops of the 574 Brigade under the 57 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi, commanded by Major General B.P.S De Silva contributed to this humanitarian project due to hardship being experienced by devotees because of the prevailing severe drought in the area.
